Interface map.Strategy

public interface Strategy
Strategies for Programmer's Minesweeper. A strategy is an object that plays a game of minesweeper using the methods provided by the Map class.

See Also:
PGMS, Map

play(Map)
Plays a game of mine sweeper.

play 
 public abstract void play(Map m)
Plays a game of mine sweeper.

Parameters:
m - the map of mines
